description: This file is a server-side entry point for a Remix application, handling server requests, rendering React components to streams, and managing HTTP response headers.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main export that handles incoming server requests by routing bot and browser requests, setting necessary response headers, and managing streaming rendering.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles requests from bots/user-agents by rendering the React app to a stream and responding with the generated HTML.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles requests from browsers by rendering the React app to a stream and responding with the generated HTML.
